Deals of the Day - 7/11/12 Wednesday July 11, 2012 by TODD Our deal hunters have searched low and high today to bring you the best deals from around the Web. See below for today's top d... more
Tools For Shoppers:
Fly or Drive Calculator™ Planning your next trip and wondering whether to fly or drive? Compare the cost and time of driving vs flying. more...
Amazon Discount Finder Find secret savings&hidden discounts at Amazon.com! more...
Amazon Free Shipping Filler Want to qualify for Amazon's Super Saver Free Shipping Offer but haven't met your $25 purchase price? more...
Discounted Gift Card Finder Using our Discount Gift Card Finder, you can purchase gift cards for many of your favorite stores for up to 25% off retail value! more...
House vs. Car Cost Comparison Ever wonder how much you should spend on a car? more...
Electric Car Calculator Compare the environmental and financial costs of buying and electric car to hybrid, diesel and gas-powered vehicles. more...
Tools For Bloggers and Webmasters:
Amazon Discount Widget Give your visitors access to the most heavily discounted items at Amazon. Best of all, if you have an Amazon Associates Account, you will get paid when your visitors save. more...
Coupon Widget Display the latest online coupons for your favorite stores right on your website. Best of all, if you have an affiliate account you can get paid any time one of your visitors uses a coupon. more...
Fly or Drive Widget Add the BeFrugal.com Fly or Drive Calculator™to your website and let your users compare the total cost and travel time of any trip for both driving and flying. more...
Weekly Ad Widget Give your users instant access to the latest weekly ad circulars. The BeFrugal.com Weekly Ad Finder widget features 200+ weekly ads more...

Why join? Get coupons and cash back at 3000+ stores - and even use both to "double-up" your savings. Simply join, then start your online shopping session at BeFrugal.com. There are no points, no forms, no fees - just cash back to you via check or Paypal. Stores pay BeFrugal.com a commission for sending them shoppers and we share that commission with you in the form of cash back.
